@ian262 Hi, 

Please contact us via our chat or phone with the booking reference so we can check the refund.  https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Regards,
Peter

SAS💙@Staralliance⭐️

One surprise at a time, we are here to help you make that special connection with the people who matter most #ConnectingYourWorld #EveryConnectionMatters #StarAllianceFamily https://t.co/N1hJtKs8Z8

data.text:
@TheJmaster6 Hello again,

You can contact our live chat directly via this link: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Or if you prefer to call us then you can find your local SAS phone number on the same link provided above.

Best regards,
Emilia

data.text:
@miaek98 Hej!

Vad roligt att du vill resa denna rutt! Du kan gärna skicka in dina förslag här: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh - välj Other > General Views > Time Table > Suggestion
Då kommer vi kunna ha det i åtanke i framtiden!

Allt gott,
Emilia

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @manckath Hi! I recommend that you call us and we can look at that and help you to rebook if you want to do that! All our numbers are here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Kind regards Jonna.
@Alex__Hurtado Hi Alex! you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.
@Fondacey Hi! you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.
@LuukDobbe Hi! If you have waited for more than 8 weeks without a response from our Customer Care, please contact us on live-chat with your case ID and we can help you. Kind regards Jonna.

urls.title: SAS | Entry requirements for your trip
urls.description: Find up-to-date entry requirements for your trip.

data.text: @niclashedam Hej! SAS har begränsad information om inträdesregler. Du hittar information om vad som gäller dig här: https://t.co/YhT9mVcFsM. Om du behöver mer detaljerad information, kontakta dina lokala myndigheter eller respektive lands ambassad. Med vänliga hälsningar Jonna.

@grumblingjay Hi, customer service are not able to assist with compensation claims unfortunately. If you have waited for more than 8 weeks without a response from our Customer Care, please contact us on live-chat with your case ID and we can send a reminder to Customer Care.

// Anton.

@Fondacey Hi, I am sorry to hear you have issues with the SAS APP. I recommend you to try re-installing the app to see if it clears the issues you experienced. 
You can otherwise download the documents from your email to your phone. 
Kind regards, 
Rebecka

data.text:
@Immersedinsadne Hi! We are happy to assist you with your questions on our Live Chat or by phone! You can find our Live Chat and phone numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj - Please select your region in the drop down menu.
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Manage My Bookings and Flights
urls.description: Log in with your booking reference (5-6 characters) and your last name to see all the details about your flights and manage your bookings »

data.text:
@daz1607 Hi, if there are any changes in the flight schedule, you will be notified as soon as we have that information available. You can also keep up to date of your flight status on our website: https://t.co/yZoPBVnDMr

Kind regards, Rebecka

@CelticFanBaby Hi! Our Online check in opens 30 hours before the departure. It is a bit long currently for the check in to have opened for your flight on Saturday.

Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@napuna_ Hello! 
You can apply for compensation for unexpected costs as a result of the canceled flight via customer care. You can contact them via this link:
https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 and select "General Complaint or compliment".

Kind regards, Anja!

@y_ruthy Hej, du kommer tjäna poäng på resan när du flyger med oss till Japan, det verkar dock vara att hemsidan inte har möjlighet att beräkna poängen för tillfället. Du hittar de poäng du tjänar för varje reseklass med SAS här: https://t.co/xSSLKYaLHM
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@mamma_fairy Hi! We unfortunately do not have lounge access in Dublin to offer. But we do have an open lounge in Oslo during your transfer.
Kind regards, Rebecka

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

urls.title: Baggage
Baggage

data.text: @KlyngeC Hej! Vi ber om ursäkt för att ni fortfarande ej fått någon information gällande ert bagage. Vi rekommenderar att ni kontaktar vår baggage service. Via denna länk hittar ni kontaktinformation till den flygplats ni landade på: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM . Vänliga hälsningar, Natalie

@aggietke00 Hi! If you still haven't received information regarding your luggage, you can pick it up at Baggage Service Pickup in Terminal 3 at Kastrup airport. Please bring your baggage receipt. We do our best to deliver your delayed baggage to you as soon as possible! Kind regards, Natalie

urls.title: SAS Safe Travel – Safety and Well-Being on Board
urls.description: The safety of our travelers and staff is always our highest priority. In these days with travel restrictions it is also important to get yourself ready to travel »

data.text:
@ZoskeMarc Hi, 
The mask requirement is currently removed on domestic flights and flights within Scandinavia. We have no info for the moment when it will be removed on international flights but when it is, it will be updated on our info page https://t.co/E6bpHzaWLm

Regards,
Peter

@jbenedictbrown Hi! We sadly don't have any information about it right now, but if a trip is affected then we will contact the passengers for those flights as soon as we know about it.

//Best regards, Dennis.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
@LeonDerczynski Hi, I recommend you contact the company from which you will rent the car to see which seat fits best
//Henrik

@Filosophation Hi! If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.
@LinneaSchossow Hi! The situation is now stabilized and you can expect normal handling in Copenhagen. Kind regards Jonna.

urls.title: SAS | Entry requirements for your trip
urls.description: Find up-to-date entry requirements for your trip.

data.text: @olvrwn hi! SAS has limited information on entry rules. You can find information about what applies to you here: https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De. If you need more detailed information, contact your local authorities or the respective country's embassy. Kind regards Jonna.

@HansTranbergPR Hi! Unfortunately we can not see or estimate when we plan to make new routes, I recommend that you look at the flight program https://t.co/AGUQlA4HYX to see all the routes we currently have. With kind regards, Jonna.

data.text: Service Information: Delayed baggage at Copenhagen Airport. (Updated on February 14th, 2022) https://t.co/jRa0o9aTUU

@djfgiugno Hi Jacqueline! We'll deliver the baggage to you if you requested us to do so. But as an extra service, we enable you to pick it up at the airport directly. That way you don't have to wait for the courier. /Nicolas
Service Information: Delayed baggage at Copenhagen Airport. https://t.co/R7Snj03Wh4

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@RobBlidstrand Hej, vi har inte uppdaterat våra regler gällande munskydd på alla våra flyg ännu. Du hittar de mest uppdaterade reglerna vi har här: https://t.co/bG6acgHGid
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@iddibhai Hi, assuming you have a SAS for your entire journey and the layover in CPH is within 24 hours, yes. Your bag should be checked through. I suggest you to double-check the bag tag before you check them in as it displays the airport the bags get delivered to. 
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text: @jbenedictbrown Hi! Fees for extra baggage vary according to route and/or destination and if you purchase in advance or at the airport. data.text:
@kyle_tink93 Hi! You can check with the cabin crew during your flight to see if they are able to make an exception, but it is not something I can promise in advance.
Kind regards, Rebecka

@Aps5Needs Hi! We always recommend you to print your Attestation form in advance to avoid being charged additional fees for a service that normally isn't offered at the airport. SAS cannot answer for the charges applied for exceptions made by the airport.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@utvik Hej! Om det är långt tills du ska resa så kan vi boka om resor till andra SAS flyg utan avgift, är det nära inpå avresan och SAS har inga andra möjligheter kan Star alliance hjälpa till i dem fallen. Ring in om du vill kika på dina möjligheter.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

data.text:
@kyle_tink93 Hi, I am happy to hear you enjoy our blankets! You are not allowed to keep the blanket once you finish your flight. 
Kind regards, Rebecka

@Bill_in_Sweden Hi, I am sorry that you have had issues reaching us over the phone. If you get the message that a lot of people are calling, it is an automatic message. If you wait, you will get through into our queue so we can assist you. 
Kind regards, Rebecka

Emilia

data.text:
@MikeDunkin17689 Hello!

These seats seems to be a window and middle seat. These are seats with extra legroom, which were also paid for accordingly! For further assistance, please contact our customer service here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 

Best Regards,
Emilia

@GinteGinte Hello!
If you mean a postponed rebooking, it must be within the validity of the ticket. Please contact the travel agency for more information and for help with rebooking it. 

Best Regards,
Emilia

data.text:
@mrjaxtagram Hi, I am sorry to hear there were delays, if you are at the airport, please contact the airport staff for further information and assistance for a solution of your flight. Once you get home, you can submit a claim here: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@bartvandekooij Hi, SAS Go light has no checked in or carry on luggage included on the tickets. Reward programs does not add free checked in bags. If you would like to take your claim further, you can contact our customer care department here: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@marcnoruega Hi, sometimes it can take time before you receive an answer depending on case. You will receive a response as soon as possible. If you have waited longer than 6-8 weeks, please contact our live chat or by phone so we can assist you further.
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@McRibsAreBack Hi, our website is https://t.co/cOl3N0wch4 and you can only have a stopover of maximum 24 hours on most of our tickets. If you wish to make a special booking you are more than welcome to call our support: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@pswexler Hello! We apologize for the wait. Unfortunately, our customer care department has a handling time of 5-8 weeks. You'll receive an email as soon as possible from them. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Natalie

@marcnoruega Hi! Our customer care department has a handling time of 5-8 weeks. They'll get in contact with you via mail as soon as possible. We apologize for the wait and thank you for your patience! 
Kind regards, Natalie

data.text: @ghebr Hi! you can apply for refund for that via customer care, here: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 select "General Complaint or compliment".  Kind regards, Jonna.

@NonsenseJoe Hi! Unfortunately we can not see or estimate when we plan to make new routes, I recommend that you look at the flight program https://t.co/AGUQlA4HYX to see all the routes we currently have. With kind regards, Jonna.

urls.title: Contact forms

data.text: @XimenaBahnsen Hi!  you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at that and and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

urls.title: SAS | Entry requirements for your trip
urls.description: Find up-to-date entry requirements for your trip.

data.text: @marcnoruega Hi! SAS has limited information on entry rules. You can find information about what applies to you here: https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De If you need more detailed information,  contact your local authorities or the respective country's embassy. Kind regards Jonna.

urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@DebraGlaves Hi Debra!

That is not supposed to happen. You can contact us on the live-chat via the website for help regarding this matter : https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best Regards, 
Emilia

@Evan_Sanders Hi Evan,
If you have applied for a refund of your voucher then this means it is refundable, although, I do not quite understand what could not be done. I suggest you contact our customer service for help regarding this! You can enter our live-chat via the website.

Best,
Emilia

@chris_mcpolin Hello Chris!
If you could contact our customer service so we could help you out and have a look at this, that would be great! since we do not have any insight in your booking or what has happened here on Twitter.
Thank you!
/ Emilia
